data.actual_result: The "K" in the word "Korean" is cut off (Due to iPhone X's curved display).
data.expected_result: The "K" in the word "Korean" should not be cut off.
data.short_description: When choosing languages, the K in Korean is slightly cut off (iPhone X ONLY)!
data.steps_to_repro: - Go onto the iOS Discord application - Click on settings (the gear icon) - Click on Language - Scroll all the way down to the bottom
